column2: Britain's Triumph Motorcycles aims to win over India's wealthy bikers MUMBAI
column3: Nov 22 Britain's Triumph Motorcycles will start selling its iconic bikes in India on Thursday as it seeks to capture the hearts of wealthy motor heads who ride for passion not function.

column2: Intel shares drop as Wall Street questions mobile growthIntel shares drop as Wall Street questions mobile growth SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Intel Corp fell nearly 5 percent on Friday after Wall Street came away from its investor meeting craving more evidence that the chipmaker can forge a strong mobile presence to drive up revenue and margins.  Intel shares drop as Wall Street questions mobile growth SAN FRANCISCO Shares of Intel Corp fell nearly 5 percent on Friday after Wall Street came away from its investor meeting craving more evidence that the chipmaker can forge a strong mobile presence to drive up revenue and margins. SAN FRANCISCO
